name: Operable Mechanism: Track Assemblages and Eliphas Beams

imgDesc.text:
There will sometimes be spherical beam <color=#ffe14b>relays</color> on the tracks, and their <color=#ffe14b>movement</color> can be <color=#ffe14b>controlled</color> by regulating valves.
When they receive a beam, the beam relays will fire off another beam in a certain direction.
